## RTCEngine.setAudioRouteToSpeakerphone() method

音频路由切换

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static setAudioRouteToSpeakerphone(audioRouteToSpeakerphone: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  audioRouteToSpeakerphone | boolean | 初始化配置项 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

设置是否将音频路由切换到扬声器，默认音频路由为扬声器
